title: Can't find out what my mystery skin gift is
body: it says roit gifted me but coulndt see what was it

replies.body:
Well yeah, it's a *Mystery Gift!* :P

Just kidding! I've checked your account and it looks like we delivered (1) **Extra Fresh** Poro King Summoner Icon!

Enjoy!
I think i got one too, but why?
Because you played at least one match of Poro King during the Snowdown event. :)
